item.title: Go API Versioning with Gorilla Mux
item.description: Code-Based Versioning Recently I had a problem where I needed to implement API versioning in code. The versions would share the vast majority of routes/handlers and I found that I wanted to re-use the base routes and modifying them slightly between versions. I imagined using Gorilla mux router as the base with all the routes and then creating a new router for v1, v2, etc that would ‘inherit’ the base routes and only modify a few.
